class dcm.conf.DcmConfig#

Bases: object

Capture config and support mixing with external (eg. CLI) options

The various get_* methods will tranparently handle inputs that are named references from the config file, inline configuration strings, or configuration dicts.

__init__(config_path=CONF_PATH, create_if_missing=False)#
